document_data.name: Abella Toth
document_data.mainbody: '''Abella Toth''' was one of the Magistrates of [[Cormyr]], who worked in [[Eveningstar]] and [[Wheloon]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Abella was a [[human]] woman with an almost ghostly white skin tone, long, straight black hair, and icy blue eyes. She wore a fine official Magistrate's uniform, and could be seen holding a [[holy symbol]] of [[Shar]] (no doubt kept for investigatory purposes, not her own faith).
document_data.Activities: Abella worked alongside her fellow Magistrates [[Celia Pendrick]], [[Barthold Moncrief]], and [[Cornelius Latrimor]] in the [[Wheloon Docks]] as they oversaw the prison and investigated situations as they arose.
